alert.note: Alert for Madison; Pierce; Platte; Stanton; Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 9:28AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Madison, southwestern Wayne, northeastern Platte, southeastern Pierce and Stanton Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 928 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles northeast of Hadar to 7 miles northeast of Newman Grove. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Norfolk around 935 AM CDT. Hoskins around 945 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Madison, Humphrey and Creston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
